name: High Fructose Corn Syrup
description: You can use Corn instead of Sugar in any Recepie

name: Totally Tacos
description: If you only have Recepies from Taco o Plomo get 12$

name: The Supreme BBQ
description: If you only have Recepies from Grilluminati's BBQ get 12$

name: Sweet Tooth
description: If you have all three of the Recepies Gelato, Chutney and Milkshake get 8$

name: Curry Completion
description: If you have at least 13 ingredients in the Curry Curry Recepie get 13$

name: Purist
description: If all you Recepies are from one single truck, get 8$

name: Rainbow Trucks
description: Get 3$ for each unique Truck you have Recepies from

name: No Chili Please
description: You can complete any Recepie as if you had Chili without having it

name: Risotto
description: If you have the Pasta Recepie you get 8$ if you also have Rice

name: Bean Burger
description: You can use Beans instead of Ground Meat in the Burgers! Recepie

name: Herb Life
description: You can use Cilantro as Basil and Basil as Cilantro in any Recepie

name: Vegan Gelato
description: You can use 2 Tofu to replace Egg and Dairy in the Gelato Recepie

name: Truffle Mayo Burger
description: If you have the Burger! Recpeie and also Egg, Oil and Mushrooms get 9$

name: Masala Master
description: If you have the Curry Curry Recpeie and also 3 Spice get 8$

name: Alambres
description: If you have the Taco Mix Recpeie and also Bacon and Cheese get 8$

name: Chicken Satay
description: If you have Chicken, Peanuts, Lime and Chili get 8$

name: Margherita
description: If you have Flour, Cheese and Tomato get 8$

name: Naan Burgers
description: You can use Naan instead of Hamburger Buns in any Recepie

name: Burger Curry
description: You can use Hamburger Buns instead of Naan in any Recepie

name: Fish Sauce
description: If you have Fish and Lime you can get the Bao Dream Recepie without Hoisin Sauce or Chili Mayo

name: A Bun is a Bun
description: You can use Hamburger Buns instead of Bao Buns and Bao Buns instead of Hamrbuger Buns in any Recepie

name: Bao to the Taco
description: You can use Bao Buns as Tortilla in any Recepie

name: Everything is a Taco
description: You can use Tortilla as any of Hamburger Buns, Naan and Bao Buns in any Recepie,

name: Um Actually - Peanuts is a Legume
description: You can use Peanuts as Beans and Beans as Peanuts in any Recepie
